description:
Return details on an individual file within a release.  This does
not actually return the contents of the file, just the associated
metadata.

path_parameters.description: the slug of the organization the release belongs to.
path_parameters.name: organization_slug

path_parameters.description: the version identifier of the release.
path_parameters.name: version

path_parameters.description: the ID of the file to retrieve.
path_parameters.name: file_id

title: Retrieve an Organization Release's File
